verses.verse: וּבְהַפִּֽילְכֶ֨ם <S%H5307><s%> Moreover when ye shall divide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> by lot the land בְּנַחֲלָ֗ה <S%H5159><s%> for inheritance תָּרִימוּ֩ <S%H7311><s%> ye shall offer תְרוּמָ֨ה <S%H8641><s%> an oblation לַיהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD קֹדֶשׁ֮ <S%H6944><s%> an holy portion מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> the length חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> of five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [shall be] the length וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> [reeds] and the breadth עֲשָׂ֣רָה <S%H6235><s%> [shall be] ten אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand קֹדֶשׁ־ <S%H6944><s%> This [shall be] holy ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּבוּלָ֖הּ <S%H1366><s%> in all the borders סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about

יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> of this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Of this there shall be for the sanctuary חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred בַּחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [in length] with five מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred מְרֻבָּ֣ע <S%H7251><s%> [in breadth] square סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty אַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits מִגְרָ֥שׁ <S%H4054><s%> for the suburbs ל֖וֹ סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> this הַמִּדָּ֤ה <S%H4060><s%> And of this measure הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> thou תָּמ֔וֹד <S%H4058><s%> shalt thou measure אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> the length [חֲמֵשׁ כ] (חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> fif ק) וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> of ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּבֽוֹ־ יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> and in it shall be the sanctuary קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [and] the most קָדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> holy

קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> The holy מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [portion] of the land ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַכֹּ֨הֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> shall be for the priests מְשָׁרְתֵ֤י <S%H8334><s%> the ministers הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> of the sanctuary יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַקְּרֵבִ֖ים <S%H7131><s%> which shall come near לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֤ם מָקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> and it shall be a place לְבָ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> for their houses וּמִקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> and an holy place לַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H4720><s%> for the sanctuary

וַחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> And the five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> of length וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and the ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand רֹ֑חַב <S%H7341><s%> of breadth [יִהְיֶה כ] (וְֽהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> become ק) לַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> shall also the Levites מְשָׁרְתֵ֨י <S%H8334><s%> the ministers הַבַּ֧יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like לַאֲחֻזָּ֖ה <S%H272><s%> have for themselves for a possession עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> for twenty לְשָׁכֹֽת׃ <S%H3957><s%> chambers

וַאֲחֻזַּ֨ת <S%H272><s%> the possession הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city תִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> And ye shall appoint חֲמֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> five אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand רֹ֔חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad וְאֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> long חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> and five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> the oblation הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [portion] it shall be for the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְלַנָּשִׂ֡יא <S%H5387><s%> And a [portion shall be] for the prince מִזֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> either וּמִזֶּה֩ <S%H2088><s%> side לִתְרוּמַ֨ת <S%H8641><s%> on the one side and on the other side of the oblation הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy וְלַאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <S%H272><s%> [portion] and of the possession הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before תְרֽוּמַת־ <S%H8641><s%> the oblation הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> [portion] and before אֲחֻזַּ֣ת <S%H272><s%> the possession הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city מִפְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> from the west יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward וּמִפְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side קֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> and from the east קָדִ֑ימָה <S%H6921><s%> eastward וְאֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> and the length לְעֻמּוֹת֙ <S%H5980><s%> [shall be] over against אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> one הַחֲלָקִ֔ים <S%H2506><s%> of the portions מִגְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> border יָ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> from the west אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> border קָדִֽימָה׃ <S%H6921><s%> unto the east

לָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> In the land יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לּ֥וֹ לַֽאֲחֻזָּ֖ה <S%H272><s%> shall be his possession בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall no יוֹנ֨וּ <S%H3238><s%> shall no more oppress ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer נְשִׂיאַי֙ <S%H5387><s%> and my princes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> my people וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and [the rest of] the land יִתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> shall they give לְבֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְשִׁבְטֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7626><s%> according to their tribes ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> Let it suffice לָכֶם֙ נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> you O princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חָמָ֤ס <S%H2555><s%> violence וָשֹׁד֙ <S%H7701><s%> and spoil הָסִ֔ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> remove וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and justice עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> and execute הָרִ֤ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> take away גְרֻשֹֽׁתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1646><s%> your exactions מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> from my people נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

מֹֽאזְנֵי־ <S%H3976><s%> balances צֶ֧דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Ye shall have just וְאֵֽיפַת־ <S%H374><s%> ephah צֶ֛דֶק <S%H6664><s%> and a just וּבַת־ <S%H1324><s%> bath צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> and a just יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶֽם׃

הָאֵיפָ֣ה <S%H374><s%> The ephah וְהַבַּ֗ת <S%H1324><s%> and the bath תֹּ֤כֶן <S%H8506><s%> measure אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> shall be of one יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָשֵׂ֕את <S%H5375><s%> may contain מַעְשַׂ֥ר <S%H4643><s%> the tenth part הַחֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> of an homer הַבָּ֑ת <S%H1324><s%> that the bath וַעֲשִׂירִ֤ת <S%H6224><s%> the tenth part הַחֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H2563><s%> of an homer הָֽאֵיפָ֔ה <S%H374><s%> and the ephah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> shall be according הַחֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> thereof shall be after the homer יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מַתְכֻּנְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4971><s%> the measure

וְהַשֶּׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> And the shekel עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> [shall be] twenty גֵּרָ֑ה <S%H1626><s%> gerahs עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty שְׁקָלִ֜ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <S%H2568><s%> five וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty שְׁקָלִ֗ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels עֲשָׂרָ֤ה <S%H6235><s%> ten וַחֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> fif שֶׁ֔קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels הַמָּנֶ֖ה <S%H4488><s%> shall be your maneh יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶֽם׃

זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַתְּרוּמָ֖ה <S%H8641><s%> This [is] the oblation אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תָּרִ֑ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> that ye shall offer שִׁשִּׁ֤ית <S%H8345><s%> the sixth part הָֽאֵיפָה֙ <S%H374><s%> of an ephah מֵחֹ֣מֶר <S%H2563><s%> of an homer הַֽחִטִּ֔ים <S%H2406><s%> of wheat וְשִׁשִּׁיתֶם֙ <S%H8341><s%> and ye shall give the sixth part הָֽאֵיפָ֔ה <S%H374><s%> of an ephah מֵחֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> of an homer הַשְּׂעֹרִֽים׃ <S%H8184><s%> of barley

וְחֹ֨ק <S%H2706><s%> Concerning the ordinance הַשֶּׁ֜מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil הַבַּ֣ת <S%H1324><s%> the bath הַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil מַעְשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> [ye shall offer] the tenth part הַבַּת֙ <S%H1324><s%> of a bath מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַכֹּ֔ר <S%H3734><s%> out of the cor עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> of ten הַבַּתִּ֖ים <S%H1324><s%> baths חֹ֑מֶר <S%H2563><s%> [which is] an homer כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> for ten הַבַּתִּ֖ים <S%H1324><s%> baths חֹֽמֶר׃ <S%H2563><s%> [are] an homer

וְשֶׂה־ <S%H7716><s%> lamb אַחַ֨ת <S%H259><s%> And one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַצֹּ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> out of the flock מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> of two הַמָּאתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3967><s%> out of two hundred מִמַּשְׁקֵ֣ה <S%H4945><s%> out of the fat pastures יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> for a meat offering וּלְעוֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> and for a burnt offering וְלִשְׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> and for peace offerings לְכַפֵּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> to make reconciliation עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> for them saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> All the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall give אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַתְּרוּמָ֣ה <S%H8641><s%> shall give this oblation הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> for לַנָּשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> for the prince בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> part הַנָּשִׂ֣יא <S%H5387><s%> And it shall be the prince's part יִהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָעוֹל֣וֹת <S%H5930><s%> [to give] burnt offerings וְהַמִּנְחָה֮ <S%H4503><s%> and meat offerings וְהַנֵּסֶךְ֒ <S%H5262><s%> and drink offerings בַּחַגִּ֤ים <S%H2282><s%> in the feasts וּבֶחֳדָשִׁים֙ <S%H2320><s%> and in the new moons וּבַשַּׁבָּת֔וֹת <S%H7676><s%> and in the sabbaths בְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹעֲדֵ֖י <S%H4150><s%> in all solemnities בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יַעֲשֶׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> he shall prepare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחַטָּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> the sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעוֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> and the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁלָמִ֔ים <S%H8002><s%> and the peace offerings לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> to make reconciliation בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> for בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> for the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> GOD בָּֽרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> In the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> [month] in the first לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month תִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> thou shalt take פַּר־ <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> A young בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bull תָּמִ֑ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish וְחִטֵּאתָ֖ <S%H2398><s%> and cleanse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H4720><s%> the sanctuary
